content: उपन्यस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To lay upon, place or put down, put near, place before. {@--2@} To entrust any one with, commit to the care of. {@--3@} To explain, describe minutely. {@--4@} To propose, suggest, hint, point out, state; मयोपन्यस्तेषु मंत्रेषू <ls>H. 3</ls>; इत्युभयलोकाविरुद्धं वचनमुपन्यस्तं <ls>Māl. 2</ls> spoken; सदुपन्यस्यति कृत्यवर्त्म यः <ls>Ki. 2. 3</ls> tells or points out; किमिदमुपन्यस्तं <ls>Ś. 5</ls> what is this that is proposed or said. {@--5@} To prove, establish argumentatively; <ls>Y. 2. 19.</ls>
